text: Michael Nouri (born December 9, 1945) is an American actor. He is best known for his television roles, including Dr. Neil Roberts on The O.C., Phil Grey on Damages, Caleb Cortlandt on All My Children, Eli David in NCIS, and Bob Schwartz on Yellowstone. He is also known for his movie roles in Flashdance (1983) and The Hidden (1987). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Washington, D.C.
title: Michael Nouri
